name: Demon's Dungeon Escape
description:
Art Credit:https://pixel-poem.itch.io/dungeon-assetpuck

#Control

Movement: WASD

Hide in chess/Get loot/Open locked door: E

Place trap: Left click

Throw snowball: Right click

#Hide chess

when you in chess the demon cant kill you

#Demon Sensing

when you hear DOMM sound the demon is close

when the screen is curving the demons is close the more the curve the closer the demon
